document_data.caption: A map of [[Silverymoon]] with Bowshot Ride highlighted in red.
document_data.name: Bowshot Ride
document_data.Description: Bowshot Ride was a north–south street in [[Northbank]] that ran from the Docks to the [[Old Wall]], passing through the former gatehouse of [[Helmer's Wall]], for a total distance of about 350 feet. It intersected the [[Ghostwalk (street)|Ghostwalk]] along the way.
